Description: Green glazed composition shabti of a man with a name of uncertain reading, born of Bastetirdis, with a lappet-wig, a moulded face with a beard, parallel hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the cord of an incised seed-bag which hangs over one shoulder, there is a band of incised Hieroglyphs around the waist and a column running down the front of the legs, there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
